item.title: It's time to raise taxes on the rich
item.description:
The number one issue in the country is inflation, so Democrats ought to try to enact policies that reduce inflation. On a political level, it would help them a little bit to be seen as trying to reduce inflation (rather than seen as primarily arguing about library books), and it would help them even more if inflation actually went down. But it‚Äôs also the case that, substantively, inflation is a big problem in people‚Äôs lives and one ought to try to do something about it‚Ä¶

URL: https://www.slowboring.com/p/its-time-to-raise-taxes-on-the-rich?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: Larry Summers Was Right (Rather, More Right √æan Wrong), &
